profile.name: Mehdi Bentaleb
profile.bio: Specialized in building robust web applications using the Laravel ecosystem. Based in Tangier, Morocco.

experience.description: Designed and developed an internal School Management System for Miage Tangier to automate student administration and internship tracking.
metrics: Built a comprehensive student management module to track academic records and attendance.
Developed a dedicated portal to manage partner companies and monitor student internship visits.
Implemented a secure role-based access control (RBAC) for administration, teachers, and staff.

experience.description: Providing end-to-end web development services for local businesses and startups in the Tangier region.
metrics: Developed a custom E-commerce platform for a local clothing brand, featuring a dynamic product catalog and order tracking.
Built responsive, SEO-optimized landing pages to increase brand visibility and customer conversion rates.
Integrated secure payment gateways and intuitive admin panels for seamless inventory management.

education.description: Deep dive into Backend architecture, MVC patterns, and Database optimization.
Advanced training in modern web frameworks and collaborative coding environments.

projects.title: Market Store Management
projects.description: A professional retail management system designed for inventory control, sales tracking, and automated reporting for local businesses.

projects.title: Drive-Rent Management System
projects.description: A comprehensive car rental platform featuring real-time vehicle availability tracking, automated booking management, and a customer reservation portal.

projects.title: GymFitness Frontend
projects.description: A high-performance, responsive landing page for a fitness club, featuring smooth scroll animations, a dynamic BMI calculator, and pricing plan layouts.

commands.about: Full-Stack Web Developer aiming to build robust ecosystem-driven applications. Experienced with Laravel, React, and Modern UI/UX.
commands.skills: Core: Laravel, PHP, MySQL, React, Next.js, Tailwind CSS. Tools: Git, VS Code, Composer.
